Chen died December 17, 2019 at his home in Temecula, California from lung cancer at the age of 57. ==Bibliography== * Colors of the Mountain (1999) * China's Son: Growing Up in the Cultural Revolution (2001) * Sounds of the River: A Memoir (2002) * Wandering Warrior (2003) * Brothers (2006) * My Last Empress (2012)Ghosts, grief and great love in China by Da Chen , My Last Empress.
